user_agent.objective: Plan a 10-day educational study tour to Greece for university students focusing on ancient history, archaeology, and classical studies.
user_agent.initial_message: I'm organizing a 10-day educational study tour to Greece for 25 university students. We need to visit archaeological sites, museums, and have academic lectures. Can you help me plan this educational experience?
user_agent.user_persona: Academic coordinator focused on educational value and student learning; wants comprehensive historical and cultural experiences.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want to visit 15 archaeological sites, then reduce to 8 key sites when reminded of group logistics and learning depth.
When asked about group size, provide unrealistic number '500 students' first; after system challenges, correct to actual group size of 25.
Request private access to closed archaeological sites, then accept public site visits and guided tours when explained about access restrictions.
Educational site information request times out; retry succeeds with comprehensive archaeological site and museum details.
Student accommodation search returns empty results; broadening criteria finds suitable group lodging options.
Group booking fails due to missing student identification requirements; retry with proper student group documentation succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds educational accommodations suitable for large student groups with group discounts and academic facilities.
System handles user.change_mind by reducing from 15 to 8 archaeological sites for better group logistics and learning depth.
System challenges unrealistic group size and guides user to appropriate group size for educational tour planning.
System explains impossibility of private archaeological site access and provides realistic public site visit options.
System handles tool.timeout on educational sites by retrying and providing comprehensive archaeological and museum information.
System handles tool.no_results on student accommodations by broadening search and finding suitable group lodging.
System handles tool.validation_error on group bookings by retrying with complete student group documentation.
System plans educational activities with appropriate pacing for student learning and group management.
System includes academic lectures, museum visits, and research opportunities aligned with classical studies curriculum.
System creates comprehensive educational itinerary with site visits, learning objectives, and group coordination.
